title: Batak Toba - John (Print)
description: Batak Toba translation of the Gospel of John. The Batak Toba are the most numerous of the Batak people of North Sumatra, Indonesia, and often considered the classical 'Batak', most likely to willingly self-identify as Batak.

language.name: Batak Toba
language.area: North Sumatra, Samosir Island and east, south, and west of Toba Lake.
